member.summary: It's going to try some operation that returns a result and if it fails, it's going to handle the exception.
member.typeparam: The type of the result awaited.
member.param: In case of handle some exception. You should return if the operation was handled or not. When it's handled, the exception message will not be displayed.

member.returns: The awaited result or null if it fails.
